name: Hole In The Wall (itch) (breakableBird)
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED     Created for the Boss Rush Jam 2023.

Asleep at work as the caretaker of a restaurant & office supply warehouse, you awaken to find that giants have landed in your town, and demand that you feed them.

A cooking, roguelite boss rush game:

  • Feed Instead of fight
  • Buy and move furniture to create an optimized kitchen layout
  • Choose different ingredients to add to your delicious borgers.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move

Space to pick up

'D' to Interact

Inspired by PlateUp! and Overcooked and other similar cooking games.

The shop song was created by Yubatake and I got it through the site OpenGameArt.org, and I wrote the rest of the music.

The HTML5 build of the game has quite a few problems (just how gamemaker is, and I was dumb and didn't play test in HTML5 enough), so if there are a lot of visual issues - also if it's generally just not responding, reload the page :)
